column4: Need help.!I use the 9.04 ubuntu. the problem is i have no audio sound.how can i fix it?
Dr_Willis:Need help.!I use the 9.04 ubuntu. the problem is i have no audio sound.how can i fix it?
Try sudo alsamixer in terminal and press m for muting some of the channels..
type alsamixer in terminal to check if alsa is installd, orelse type: sudo apt-get install gnome-alsamixer
